## Motivation

What problem does this feature solve? Is it blocking a workflow or improving usability?

## Proposal

- Describe the desired behaviour / API
- Include pseudo code or DiffSL snippets if applicable

## Alternatives

Have you tried other tools or workarounds? Why are they insufficient?

## Additional context

Links to papers, benchmarks, or related issues. If you plan to contribute the feature yourself, mention it here along with any design constraints we should be aware of.
